title: The Best little whorehouse in Texas [Widescreen]
creator_credit: Colin Higgins, Robert L Boyett, Edward Milkis, Thomas Miller, RKO Radio Pictures and Universal Pictures
brief_description: A sheriff and a proprietess join together not only in romance, but to fight a big city TV crusader in his efforts to expose the Chicken Ranch to public scandal, and thus close it down. Based on the stage play written by Larry L. King and Peter Masterton. Cast includes Burt Reynolds, Dolly Parton, Dom DeLuise, Charles Durning, Jim Nabors, Robert Mandan.
